lead_paragraph: MARCUS--Richard, 89, of Manhattan and Boca Raton on March 1st. Beloved husband of Helen Anne Marcus and loving father of Gwen Marcus, Nancy Alpert and the late Stuart Marcus. Dick was a WWII medic, 'recovering' lawyer, leading title insurance executive and amateur herpetologist. We will miss his quick wit, abundant charm and the twinkle in his eye. Services on Sunday, March 6th at 11:30am at Plaza Jewish Chapel, 630 Amsterdam Ave. at 91st St. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to the Wildlife Conservation Society headquartered at the Bronx Zoo. 1/3
